statements: DELETE FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE pollution_level > 50 AND temperature < 20;
DELETE FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND country_name = 'USA';
DELETE FROM EnvironmentalHealthData WHERE temperature > 30 OR pollution_level > 50;
DELETE FROM environmental_factors WHERE factor_id = 3 AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM public_health_issues WHERE cases_reported < 100 AND country = 'India';
DELETE FROM ResearchData WHERE topic = 'Covid-19' AND publication_date < '2021-01-01';
